List of all members.

Detailed Description

Describes dynamic light source properties in the scene.

Note that the light properties are only 'hints' to the shader which is used to render the geometry. Actual shader might or might not use some specific property and the usage of light properties is shader dependent.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum hgr::Light::Type
 

Type of light.

Enumeration values:
TYPE_UNKNOWN  Unknown light type.
TYPE_DIRECTIONAL  Distant light source (like sun).
TYPE_OMNI  Omnidirectional point light source (like a candle).

Default.

TYPE_SPOT  Spot light source (like a lamp).
TYPE_COUNT  Number of different types.
